name: Sudoku
body:
# SuDoKu
## The Application
This application was made in Qt using c++ to create a fully functional Sudoku game and solver.
The application can generate puzzles, import puzzles from a tab-delimited input file, and have a user hand enter a puzzle.
The user can try to solve the puzzle, check if their solution is valid, or autosolve the puzzle
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
